Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer - Full Warranty Jackson JS Series Dinky Minion Jackson JS1X Black - Used 2/3 Scale Electric Guitar - Used - Description Get Giant Sound In A Small Package — At A Steal! Featuring a 2/3-scale (22.5”), the JS Series Dinky Minion JS1X is ideal for little shredders or grownup road dogs who need an easy-traveling instrument jam-packed with the features they love. The Dinky Minion JS1X has a poplar body, speedy bolt-on maple neck with graphite reinforcement rods and a 12” radius amaranth fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets and sharkfin inlays. Other features include a rear-angled headstock for evenly distributed tension (reducing playing fatigue), sculpted heel for easy upper register playing, dual Jackson high-output humbucking pickups with three-way blade switching, a string-through-body hardtail bridge and black hardware. 22.5" Scale Length At 22.5" scale length, this shorter scale guitar is ideal for little shredders or grownup road dogs who need an easy-traveling instrument. One-Piece Bolt-On Maple With Graphite Reinforcement And Scarf Joint A type of neck constructed with a scarf joint for an angled back headstock, which in turn increases the tension behind the nut eliminating the need for string trees and/or string retainer bars. The bolt-on neck joins the neck to the body of the guitar with screws or bolts, allowing for more control, attack and sustain.
